mapper.select: /*selectLeaderboard*/ SELECT t1.game_id ,t1.round_no ,CASE WHEN t1.accu_rank IS NOT NULL THEN t1.accu_rank -- WHEN t2.game_giveup_type IS NOT NULL THEN -1 ELSE 0 END accu_rank ,CASE t1.round_no WHEN 1 THEN 0 WHEN 2 THEN r1_rank - r2_rank WHEN 3 THEN r2_rank - r3_rank WHEN 4 THEN r4_rank - r4_rank ELSE 0 END rank_up_dn ,t2.player_nation_code ,t2.player_name ,IFNULL(t4.use_yn, 'N') is_titlelist ,t1.accu_sum_underpar ,t1.udpar_sum_tot ,t1.round_end_yn ,t3.r1_score ,t3.r2_score ,t3.r3_score ,t3.r4_score ,t3.accu_sum_score ,IFNULL(t5.point_ranking, 0) point_ranking ,IFNULL(t5.accu_point, 0) accu_point ,t6.start_in_out ,REGEXP_REPLACE(t7.code_text, ".*(DQ|WD|RTD|Cut).*", '\\1') as exception_type_nm ,t2.member_id ,t2.player_class_type FROM kpga_db.game_player t2 LEFT OUTER JOIN kpga_db.game_score t1 ON t1.game_id = t2.game_id AND t1.member_id = t2.member_id AND t1.round_no = #{roundNo} LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT t0.member_id ,SUM(CASE WHEN t0.round_no = 1 THEN t0.accu_rank ELSE 0 END ) r1_rank ,SUM(CASE WHEN t0.round_no = 1 THEN t0.score_sum_tot ELSE 0 END ) r1_score ,SUM(CASE WHEN t0.round_no = 2 THEN t0.accu_rank ELSE 0 END ) r2_rank ,SUM(CASE WHEN t0.round_no = 2 THEN t0.score_sum_tot ELSE 0 END ) r2_score ,SUM(CASE WHEN t0.round_no = 3 THEN t0.accu_rank ELSE 0 END ) r3_rank ,SUM(CASE WHEN t0.round_no = 3 THEN t0.score_sum_tot ELSE 0 END ) r3_score ,SUM(CASE WHEN t0.round_no = 4 THEN t0.accu_rank ELSE 0 END ) r4_rank ,SUM(CASE WHEN t0.round_no = 4 THEN t0.score_sum_tot ELSE 0 END ) r4_score ,SUM(t0.score_sum_tot) accu_sum_score FROM kpga_db.game_score t0 WHERE t0.game_id = #{gameId} GROUP BY t0.member_id ) t3 ON t2.member_id = t3.member_id LEFT OUTER JOIN kpga_db.sponsor_player t4 ON t2.member_id = t4.member_id AND t4.sponsor_id = '0072' AND t4.use_yn = 'Y' AND t4.sponsor_type = 'BS' LEFT OUTER JOIN kpga_db.game_year_point t5 ON t2.member_id = t5.member_id AND t5.game_year = '2024' AND t5.tour_id = '11' AND t5.point_type = '0' LEFT OUTER JOIN kpga_db.game_round_starttime t6 ON t1.game_id = t6.game_id AND t1.round_no = t6.round_no AND t1.start_time_id = t6.start_time_id LEFT OUTER JOIN kpga_db.sys_cmm_cd t7 ON t2.game_giveup_type = t7.code_value AND t7.group_id = 'exception_type' LEFT OUTER JOIN kpga_db.game_score t8 ON t8.game_id = t2.game_id AND t8.member_id = t2.member_id AND t8.round_no = '2' LEFT OUTER JOIN kpga_db.game_round_starttime t9 ON t8.game_id = t9.game_id AND t8.round_no = t9.round_no AND t8.start_time_id = t9.start_time_id WHERE t2.game_id = #{gameId} ORDER BY t2.game_giveup_type IS NOT NULL, t1.accu_rank IS NULL ,t1.accu_sum_underpar, t6.start_time ASC , t6.start_in_out ASC ,t1.start_tee_off_order ASC ,(t1.score_13+t1.score_14+t1.score_15+t1.score_16+t1.score_17+t1.score_18) ASC ,(t1.score_16+t1.score_17+t1.score_18) ASC ,t1.score_18 ASC ,t1.score_17 ASC ,t8.accu_sum_underpar, t9.start_time ASC , t9.start_in_out ASC ,t8.start_tee_off_order ASC ,(t8.score_13+t8.score_14+t8.score_15+t8.score_16+t8.score_17+t8.score_18) ASC ,(t8.score_16+t8.score_17+t8.score_18) ASC ,t8.score_18 ASC ,t8.score_17 ASC
/*selectStandPoint*/ SELECT t1.dsb_rank ,t1.ofc_dsb_point FROM kpga_db.game_point_dsbtbl t1 WHERE t1.game_id = #{gameId} AND t1.point_type = 0

/*selectPlayerPoint*/ SELECT t1.accu_point ,t1.point_ranking ,t1.member_id FROM kpga_db.game_year_point t1 WHERE t1.game_year = '2024' AND t1.point_type = 0 AND t1.tour_id = '11' ORDER BY t1.point_ranking;
